title: Queensland Self-Contained Apartment Escape near Rockhampton Overlooking Yeppoon Main Beach
description:
A stay to remember awaits at Echelon Apartments Yeppoon on the Capricorn Coast, perfectly positioned on the foreshore and within easy reach of the town's main shops, restaurants and bars. Feel right at home within these modern apartments complete with an open-plan lounge and dining area, fully equipped kitchen and private balcony. When you're ready to tear yourself away from your apartment, head to the rooftop pool to take a refreshing dip or make use of the adjoining alfresco dining and BBQ facilities. 

Venture beyond your apartment to explore this coastal enclave and visit Great Keppel Island and the incredible Southern Great Barrier Reef, dive into the Yeppoon Lagoon Pool overlooking the Coral Sea, or make the short 15-minute drive to Emu Park to visit the Singing Ship sculpture.
